name: Funny Kart Racing
description:
Funny Kart Racing is simple to play and have fun oh, using the gravity sensing system, control the direction of the car,, let other players also blended in among them. Drive into an action-packed, surprise-filled world of off-road kart racing mayhem. Race against a field of real rival drivers, each with unique personalities and special abilities.
features:
- High-end Formula racing cars outrunning each other
- Brilliant HD graphics in a visually stunning 3D experience
